Body:
How can I connect the private wireless sensor networks uses the Wireless standard 900HP-S3B in temperature sensors help in creating the PAN network with KAA platform for data analytics.

I want to make the wireless mesh network internet friendly
column10:
all the values are displaying on a local web server using default host id of gateway receiver. Is it possible to uses MQTT broker? or HTTP client protocol will easily resolve my problem?

"
